messages.subject: maps (was Re: Conference for 2005)
messages.msgSnippet: If there s a map of where unschoolers are, would it be people from this list? Some lurk and don t post. People who went to last year s conference or might go
messages.messageBody:
If there's a map of where unschoolers are, would it be people from this list?
Some lurk and don't post.
People who went to last year's conference or might go next year?

If anyone wants to mark a real map at home, even then who would you mark?

And it would need to be a world map, if it's this list, but would you take
the pin off if the mom dropped off the list or the kids went to school?

Too much work for my tastes. Too complicated. I'm just interested in the
ideas without regard to where they come from.

Sandra
